name: Whispering Pines
description: A temperate forest region with misty roads, old shrines, and a trading hamlet.

locations.name: Lanternrest Inn
locations.notes: Warm hearth, creaky stairs, and a watchful proprietor.

locations.name: Old Pine Road
locations.notes: A winding trade and pilgrimage path where travelers report pale lights at dusk and recent disappearances near the third stone marker.

loreHooks: An old shrine deep in the pines is said to answer questions at a cost.
A missing caravan never reached Lanternrest last week.
A wagon vanished near the third stone marker on Old Pine Road five nights ago.
A third marker shard bears a spiral sigil that reacted to the player on contact.
